import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get resolution action"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/resolutions/actions/{actionId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves detailed metadata for a single resolution action.

**Prerequisites**
1. **actionId** â€“ Use [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/actions](/docs/api/tickets/list-resolution-actions) to list available actions and capture `Items[].ResolutionActionId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List actions in scope: [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/actions](/docs/api/tickets/list-resolution-actions).
2. Choose the desired action and copy `ResolutionActionId` from the response.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/actions/\{actionId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-resolution-action) with the identifier to view full details.

**Minimal Required Fields**: actionId (path parameter).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"actionId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
